title: Ep 89: Just a Couple of Goofballs
description:
In This Episode: We talk about men showing their emotions to their partners and having it backfire, a boyfriend feels betrayed by his girlfriend throwing him under the bus with police, a listener wants to know if they are the A-hole for never finding their partner physically attractive, and a husband is faced with an impossible choice of Batman or his child's birth. Christian also got Josh-isms from his co-workers perspective!
 Get Judgies Merch Here: https://www.bonfire.com/store/the-judgies-podcast/ 
Our Patreon is officially open, if you want to see extra content go check it out! https://www.patreon.com/JudgiesPod 
Send us mail! (Addressed However You'd Like) P.O. Box 58 Ottawa, IL 61350 
Leave a Review! https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-judgies/id1519741238 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod 
Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod 
Intro Music by: Iván https://open.spotify.com/artist/5gB2VvyqfnOlNv37PHKRNJ?si=f6TIYrLITkG2NZXGLm_Y-Q&dl_branch=1 
Story Links: 
0:00 Intro
